Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado en mi vida. El cooperativo es muy divertido y frustrante a la vez, los dos jugadores se tienen que complementar y compaginar muy bien para superar cada prueba. Tampoco dejemos de lado el singleplayer que es una maravilla. Si te lo pasas en sus tres modos sos Stephen Hawkins. RECOMENDADISIMO!! 10/10

[h1] Overview [/h1]
Portal 2 is an absolutely great game. I personally think that the original Portal is harder in difficulty than Portal 2, but the story is much more developed than the side game of the Orange Box that was Portal. Besides the story, Portal 2 has some new mechanics such as the Laser Redirection Box and especially the gels. Portal 2 is absolutely a great successor to what is one of the greatest games ever.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
The gameplay of Portal 2 is very much similar to Portal in gameplay. It takes place after Portal in the now decayed facility. The beginning of the game has new puzzles similar to the first game, but the great bit of the game for me is later when the introduce the gels. I loved the gels later in the game and I also loved the new old looking test chambers down in the bottom of the testing facility. The main game is great, however I also loved the coop mode. I haven't it much because I don't really have many people to play with. However its a pleasant addition to the game, but another great addition to the game is workshop support. Many people have made maps and I've even made some maps myself. Its a feature that this game absolutely needed as more and more levels are available from the community and they can make extremely difficult maps.

[h1] Soundtrack and Visuals [/h1]
The visuals of the game look a bit more sharper than the first game, however I really loved the decayed setting of the facility. Especially when down in the abandoned test chambers I loved the gel testing chambers along with the older chamber designs. The soundtrack as well is great for the game. It fits perfectly into the game and improves the immersive experience of the game.

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]
I would absolutely recommend this legendary game. It is one of the greatest games ever made and I think is the greatest puzzle game ever made. I love playing workshop maps that people make as well as the main game. The coop mode is something I don't do much but is also nice. This absolutely deserves a recommendation.

[h1]Suggestions & Criticism[/h1]
Although you could comment on my review to suggest things or criticize pieces of it, please consider posting in my the discussion forums on my community group, linked below, so that I can respond. You can also chat with me some more as well. Also feel free, if you like my reviews, to follow my curator page to see me in the store and join my community group if you want updates when I post new reviews.

Curator Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/40789272/

Community Group:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Nowi-kun

This game, I can't even begin to describe how warm in makes me feel inside. glados' voice, it just makes me feel a love i haven't felt in 20 years. Whenever I play co-op I play as if I'm a master at strategy, this game is not for anyone with an iq under 200. It requires such intense thinking that I don't even think albert einstein could have beaten this game no matter how hard he tried.

This game is absolutely amazing. Everyone should play it at least once in their life. This game is perfect for people that want to have a great game on their older computer, which is what I needed, as I have a macbook 10.10.5. The gameplay is great, and you should definitely give Portal 2 a try.

Se alguém te falar que videogames não são arte, mostre esse jogo.

Portal 2 conseguiu elevar tudo que Portal tinha feito, tanto mecanicamente quanto em relação a história, além de possuir um divertidíssimo modo cooperativo e um editor de fases, sendo para mim, o melhor jogo que a Valve já fez.

Recomendo comprá-lo mesmo em preço cheio, 20 reais não é nada ao que esse jogo oferece.

“All right, I've been thinking, when life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager!
Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man whose gonna burn your house down - with the lemons!”

Не люблю игры VALVe, но portal оставил опечатак на моём сердце. Отличная и несложная головоломка, с чёрным юмором, характерными персонажами (кроме молчаливого гг), хорошем сюжетом и помбезной концовкой. 
Есть что-то особенное в играх valve.
